content: key key ring i ve recently got a new pair of keys and i ve already had problems with finding them in my bag… so i thought i desperately need some kind of a key ring to make them bigger and easier to be found and i just had to make it myself thinking about the shape of it i thought that it would be quite funny to have a key key ring i didn t stuff the key but you can do it if you like it would be a good idea to stuff the parts as you go with small amounts of stuffing materials hook 3mm yarn dk 300m in 100g 100% acrylic but cotton should be even better the pattern is worked in continuous rounds abbreviations chain chain double_crochet double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch increase 2 stitches in one decrease 2 stitches worked together x number of stitches in a row instructions the base 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook 6 2 11 1sc around 6 12 chain 3 skip 2sc slip_stitch in the next single_crochet 3sc 13 3sc in chain space in back loops only and 1 single_crochet in each of the next 3 single_crochet 6 14 30 1sc around 6 31 bend the long part and connect it with its beginning to form a circle you can do it with sl sts or simply sew it together secure the thread and finish off the small part element a 1 ch2 4 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook 4 pattern by justyna kacprzak cuteandkaboodle com all rights reserved 2 1sc around 4 secure the thread and finish off element b 1 ch2 4 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook 4 2 1sc around 4 3 we re going to join the two elements now 2sc ch1 4sc in the last row of the element a 2sc in the element b 9 4 1 single_crochet around 9 secure the thread and finish off sew the small part on the base wherever you want you re done pattern by justyna kacprzak www cuteandkaboodle com if you have any questions concerning the pattern feel free to contact me at kacprzak_justyna@wp pl *** please respect the copyright on this pattern and do not resell
